cause.description:
a person has the right to love ho heor her wants to love. no one should out a limit on who you can have feelings for. love is an expression not a rule. people should be free to show there feelings without fear of the law or natural community judging them. stand up, SUPPORT LOVE of all forms.
DISCRIMINATION WILL NOT BE TOLORATED FIGHT FOR YOUR RIGHT TO LOVE.
1. homosexuality freedom
2. discrimitaion
cause.name: SUPPORT LOVE
